items.sentence: Tom couldn\'t remember the combination for the safe.
Tom can\'t decide unless you tell him all the facts.
Tom can\'t help wondering why Mary changed her mind.
Tom can\'t listen to music without tapping his foot.
I\'d like to live in Boston for the rest of my life.
I\'ll have to ask Tom to come over and do it for me.
I\'ve been reading a really interesting book lately.
Tom entered the unlocked apartment without knocking.
Tom and Mary weren\'t wearing their school uniforms.
I thought I\'d surprise Mary and take her to dinner.
